spec.title: CSS Backgrounds and Borders Module Level 3

background-repeat.name: background-repeat
background-repeat.computedValue: list, each item a pair of keywords, one per dimension

background-attachment.name: background-attachment
background-attachment.computedValue: list, each item the keyword as specified

background-position.name: background-position
background-position.percentages: refer to size of background positioning area minus size of background image; see text
background-position.computedValue: list, each item a pair of offsets (horizontal and vertical) from the top left origin each given as a computed <length-percentage> value

background-clip.name: background-clip
background-clip.computedValue: list, each item a keyword as specified

background-origin.name: background-origin
background-origin.computedValue: list, each item a keyword as specified

background-size.name: background-size
background-size.computedValue: list, each item a pair of sizes (one per axis) each represented as either a keyword or a computed <length-percentage> value

border-top-color.name: border-top-color
border-top-color.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-right-color.name: border-right-color
border-right-color.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-bottom-color.name: border-bottom-color
border-bottom-color.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-left-color.name: border-left-color
border-left-color.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-color.name: border-color
border-color.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-top-style.name: border-top-style
border-top-style.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-right-style.name: border-right-style
border-right-style.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-bottom-style.name: border-bottom-style
border-bottom-style.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-left-style.name: border-left-style
border-left-style.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-style.name: border-style
border-style.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-top-width.name: border-top-width
border-top-width.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers
border-top-width.computedValue: absolute length; zero if the border style is none or hidden

border-right-width.name: border-right-width
border-right-width.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers
border-right-width.computedValue: absolute length; zero if the border style is none or hidden

border-bottom-width.name: border-bottom-width
border-bottom-width.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers
border-bottom-width.computedValue: absolute length; zero if the border style is none or hidden

border-left-width.name: border-left-width
border-left-width.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers
border-left-width.computedValue: absolute length; zero if the border style is none or hidden

border-width.name: border-width
border-width.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-top.name: border-top
border-top.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-right.name: border-right
border-right.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-bottom.name: border-bottom
border-bottom.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-left.name: border-left
border-left.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border.name: border
border.appliesTo: all elements except ruby base containers and ruby annotation containers

border-top-left-radius.name: border-top-left-radius
border-top-left-radius.percentages: Refer to corresponding dimension of the border box.

border-top-right-radius.name: border-top-right-radius
border-top-right-radius.percentages: Refer to corresponding dimension of the border box.

border-bottom-right-radius.name: border-bottom-right-radius
border-bottom-right-radius.percentages: Refer to corresponding dimension of the border box.

border-bottom-left-radius.name: border-bottom-left-radius
border-bottom-left-radius.percentages: Refer to corresponding dimension of the border box.

border-radius.name: border-radius
border-radius.percentages: Refer to corresponding dimension of the border box.

border-image-source.name: border-image-source
border-image-source.appliesTo: All elements, except internal table elements when border-collapse is collapse
border-image-source.computedValue: the keyword none or the computed <image>

border-image-slice.name: border-image-slice
border-image-slice.appliesTo: All elements, except internal table elements when border-collapse is collapse
border-image-slice.percentages: refer to size of the border image
border-image-slice.computedValue: four values, each either a number or percentage; plus a fill keyword if specified

border-image-width.name: border-image-width
border-image-width.appliesTo: All elements, except internal table elements when border-collapse is collapse
border-image-width.percentages: Relative to width/height of the border image area
border-image-width.computedValue: four values, each either a number, the keyword auto, or a computed <length-percentage> value

border-image-outset.name: border-image-outset
border-image-outset.appliesTo: All elements, except internal table elements when border-collapse is collapse
border-image-outset.computedValue: four values, each a number or absolute length

border-image-repeat.name: border-image-repeat
border-image-repeat.appliesTo: All elements, except internal table elements when border-collapse is collapse

box-shadow.name: box-shadow
box-shadow.computedValue: either the keyword none or a list, each item consisting of four absolute lengths plus a computed color and optionally also a inset keyword
box-shadow.animationType: by computed value, treating none as a zero-item list and appending blank shadows (transparent 0 0 0 0) with a corresponding inset keyword as needed to match the longer list if the shorter list is otherwise compatible with the longer one

<bg-position>.value: [ left | center | right | top | bottom | <length-percentage> ] | [ left | center | right | <length-percentage> ] [ top | center | bottom | <length-percentage> ] | [ center | [ left | right ] <length-percentage>? ] && [ center | [ top | bottom ] <length-percentage>? ]

<line-style>.value: none | hidden | dotted | dashed | solid | double | groove | ridge | inset | outset
